summary: AI recommends buying 100 shares of AAPL at $149.50 with 72% confidence. Primary drivers: volume spike (1.52x average), RSI oversold condition, and bullish MACD crossover. Recommended stop at $146.00 (2.3% risk) and target at $155.00 (3.7% gain), yielding a 1.6:1 risk/reward ratio.

contributingFactors.historicalContext: Volume spikes of this magnitude have preceded 5-8% moves 68% of the time in the past 6 months

contributingFactors.description: RSI at 42 suggests oversold condition, potential bounce
contributingFactors.historicalContext: RSI below 45 with volume increase has led to mean reversion 72% of the time

contributingFactors.description: MACD line crossed above signal line (bullish)
contributingFactors.historicalContext: MACD crossovers in this direction have been profitable 65% of the time with average gain of 4.2%
Volatility compression followed by volume expansion has led to 6-12% moves 58% of the time

alternativeScenarios.outcome: Price bounces from current level to $151-152 range
Price continues down, stop loss triggered

riskAssessment.notes: Position size calculated to limit risk to 2% of portfolio. Stop loss set at 2.3% below entry based on ATR. Consider reducing size if market volatility increases.

calculation.reason: Limited to 100 shares due to daily volume constraints and position concentration limits

entryStrategy.reason: Limit order reduces slippage. Current bid-ask spread is $0.02, market order would fill at ~$149.52

stopLoss.reason: Stop set at 2.4x ATR to avoid noise while protecting capital

takeProfit.reason: Target set at previous resistance level with 1.6:1 risk/reward

trailingStop.reason: Trailing stop activates once position is profitable to lock in gains

whatIfAnalysis.question: What if stop loss moved to -1%?

analysis.impact: Tighter stop increases risk/reward but may be stopped out by normal volatility. Current ATR suggests 1.2% moves are common, so -1% stop has 35% chance of premature exit.
Doubling position increases portfolio risk to 4.2%, exceeding recommended 3% max per trade. Margin usage increases to 59.8%.
Higher volatility requires wider stop and smaller position to maintain same risk level. Consider waiting for volatility to normalize or reduce position size.

requiredDisclosures: Signal generated by AI model. Past performance does not guarantee future results.
User must review and approve all trades. Auto-execution requires explicit opt-in.
Position sizing recommendations are suggestions only. User is responsible for final decision.

algoRegistration.notes: For India/SEBI compliance, ensure algo metadata is logged per regulatory requirements
